items.question: What exactly is a digital secretary?
items.answer: It's an AI-powered system that replaces all repetitive admin tasks: automatic responses to messages (WhatsApp, Messenger, Instagram), online appointment booking 24/7, quotes sent in 2 clicks, automatic follow-ups, client tracking, reminders... In short, everything a secretary does — without a salary, without holidays, without forgotten follow-ups.

items.question: How is it better than a traditional secretary?
items.answer: A secretary costs ~€2,500/month gross + social contributions, over €30,000/year. She works 8h/day, takes holidays, can fall ill or resign. And human error happens: forgotten reminders, late quotes, wrong appointments... Our system works 24/7, never makes mistakes, and costs a one-time investment.

items.question: I do everything myself, I don't have a secretary. Is this for me?
items.answer: Especially for you. If you spend your evenings answering emails, entering invoices in Excel and doing quotes instead of growing your business — that's exactly what we solve. We free up 15+ hours/week of admin so you can focus on your craft.

items.question: How long does setup take?
items.answer: First operational version in 30 days: your digital secretary is running, you're already saving time. Final version delivered in 60 days: complete system, optimised, with training included so you're 100% autonomous.

items.question: Does it work for my trade?
items.answer: If you're an entrepreneur, tradesman or service provider and you're losing time on admin — it's made for you. Plumber, heating engineer, electrician, mechanic, carpenter, cleaning, wellness, catering... We adapt to your reality on the ground.

items.question: Is it complicated to use?
items.answer: Not at all. Everything is designed to be usable from your smartphone, between jobs. If you can send a WhatsApp, you can manage everything. And we train you so you're comfortable from day one.

items.question: What's included in the system?
items.answer: Everything you need to never play secretary again: client CRM, online diary 24/7, quote generator, invoices, automatic WhatsApp reminders, automated responses across all channels, dashboard, and management from your phone. We adapt to your trade.

items.question: Are there hidden fees?
items.answer: No. Your admin application is a one-time payment — no subscription. The only recurring cost is infrastructure maintenance (server, database, security, backups) at €50/month, and we offer the first year free. The quote is clear, no fine print.

About.title: The human behind
About.subtitle: A passion for automation at the service of Belgian tradesmen and entrepreneurs.
About.founderTitle: A vision born from the field
About.founderP1: Passionate about technology and entrepreneurship, I noticed a recurring problem: tradesmen and SMEs spend an incredible amount of time on administrative tasks instead of doing what they love — their craft.
About.founderP2: This is the observation that gave birth to monapplication.be. The idea was simple: create an accessible "digital secretary" that handles all admin automatically.
About.founderP3: Today, we support plumbers, electricians, bicycle repairers, air conditioning technicians and many other professionals in Belgium. Every day, our system responds to their clients, sends quotes and organises their schedules.

values.title: Innovation

values.title: Efficiency
